title: Why I Don’t Want Tadej Pogačar to Win Paris-Roubaix (At Least Not Sunday)
content:
The Pogačar Express is thundering toward Paris-Roubaix but what if the best thing for the sport is that he doesn’t win Sunday?

Read the full article at Why I Don’t Want Tadej Pogačar to Win Paris-Roubaix (At Least Not Sunday) on Velo.
author: ahood
